name: LABYRINTH (itch) (RetroStreet)
description:
Parkour, lava, puzzles & balls.

Jump through the levels of the deadly prison with the grasp of a key. However, beware of the many things standing in your way... LAVA... TRAPDOORS... LAVA TRAPDOORS...  LASERS... CRUSHERS... WALLS... EVERYTHING!

Install instructions

PC

  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on Labyrinth.exe
  • Have fun!

MAC

If the game doesn't work after unzipping, try to use another unarchiver program like the Unarchiver.

Linux

Right click > Properties > Permissions and tick "Allow this application to run as a program"
